Title: Bullet - Superhero
Description:
Destroy your opponents in an exciting puzzle game! Become a superhero, shoot ricochets at enemies and win! A physical game with ragdoll-style heroes will help you improve your marksmanship skills and solve difficult missions!
A fun 2D game in which a superhero must destroy all his enemies.
It's not that simple, the hero's hand is constantly moving and you'll have to aim well to hit the target!
Shoot a ricochet at the enemy and complete all levels.
Instructions: The superhero must complete all the levels by shooting at his opponents. Different skins are available in the game!

Title: Winter CosmoFest
Description: Immerse yourself in a magical winter adventure in the Honkai universe. Show your creativity by creating festive cosplay outfits for the heroes of the game. Combine gorgeous costumes, accessories and hairstyles to capture the spirit of your favorite characters among snowflakes and winter landscapes. Show off your fashion skills by choosing the perfect ensemble for the winter cosplay festival. Win the hearts of Honkai fans and share your ideas with your friends!
Instructions: The girl and her boyfriend are fond of cosplay. This time they decided to create vivid images based on the popular anime game. To do this, you need to apply makeup, buy appropriate costumes and, of course, add accessories. And in order to better get used to their image, they came up with an unusual game... The result can be saved as a PNG image. Depending on the gaming device, a computer mouse click or a simple touch on touch screens is used to control it.

Title: Put the fruit together!
Description: A game in the genre of "Connect the Balls" and "2048". Stack identical fruits to combine them into a new larger fruit! The game has incredibly beautiful and cute graphics, nice music accompaniment and addictive gameplay!
Instructions: This is an addictive game in which you have to connect fruits! You can compete with friends and coworkers to see who can score the most points! The game has a special play area where fruits fall and connect if they are the same! Your task is to connect as many fruits as possible, to get a watermelon  and get the maximum number of points! Try to become the first on the leaderboard and prove your skill! Play and enjoy this exciting game!

Title: Hungry Corgi - Cute Music Game
Description: Hungry Corgi is a music game where you feed the dog to music and try to catch the rhythm of the cutest songs created especially for this game. A perfect way to relax and have fun playing the cutest while also challenging rhythm game. Join to corgi adventure to meet new friends by opening characters, listen to fun songs and unlock incredible themes that change everything!
Instructions: Hold & Drag anywhere on the screen to control the dog and put the pieces of food directly into the corgi's mouth

Title: Save The Piggies
Description: Save The Piggies is a car-moving game. But this time you are moving not a car, but a pig or other animal. From a few pigs to a large group of pigs, you need to click on the pigs to move forward until all the pigs are there. The pig must be successfully removed to pass the level.  Have fun!
Instructions: Click to move

Title: Alphabet Lore Maze
Description: Alphabet Maze: Escape Letters is an exciting puzzle game that will help develop the struggle of minds and learn the letters of the alphabet. In this educational game you will explore the maze, defeating monsters, teddy bear and letter creatures. Choose characters from the collection that include Huggy, Teddy Bear, Harry and many other unique characters. To get out of the maze, you need to choose rooms with a smaller number than yours and avoid monsters larger than your level.
Instructions:
PC Control: Arrows/WASD
Control on a mobile device: Swipe

- Move between rooms
- Choose a room with a smaller room than yours
- Avoid enemies bigger than your level
- Move on and defeat the last monster

Title: Dead Faces Clone Online
Description:
Dead Faces Clone Online is a horror, intrigue, investigation, and object collection game in a 3D game in the dark horror category. You can play it for free in your favorite browser.

You will control the main character, who is in a building with many strange things that are happening. Investigate, follow the instructions to find the items, don't be afraid, and solve each of the levels of this game.
Instructions:
Controls:
W A S D to walk around
Mouse to Look around
Left Mouse Button to Fire
Right Mouse Button to Aim
Mouse Wheel To Change Weapons
R to Reload
E to Interact / Pickup Items
Left Shift to Run
Left C to Crouch
Space to Jump

Title: Gun War Z1
Description:
The world is in danger, a deadly virus affects more and more territories, turning people into zombies.

Clean up locations and save people
Instructions:
Simple and intuitive mouse control.
Firing a rocket to the "A" key.

Your job is to save people

Title: Machine City Balls
Description: Machine City Balls is a ball parkour game. A must play game for those who like challenges. Collect rare balls and complete all ball game challenges to become a winner! Are you ready? Start your parkour journey now!
Instructions: Slide to move

Title: Playground- Parkour
Description: Jump and break bones, destroy enemies and unlock new levels! Ragdoll physics is what you need for parkour lovers. Train, participate in the battle and upgrade your hero! You will enjoy the game if you are a lover of the playground and stick games. Run, jump and maim the heroes. Ragdoll-style physics is what you love. Deals damage and unlock new levels! Stick and Ragdoll fans will be happy.
Instructions:
Choose the training mode and then the battle mode. Run, jump, choose directions, upgrade the player!
Choose tricks and upgrade the player.

Title: Zombie Frontier Shooter
Description: Zombie Frontier Shooter is filled with non-stop action and zombie-slaying madness! Step into the shoes of a skilled sniper hunter as you embark on a mission to eliminate the relentless horde of undead creatures. In a world plagued by a lethal virus that has transformed ordinary humans into ferocious zombies. However, survivors must rise up and engage in a life-or-death struggle against the zombie menace, morphing into fearless zombie shooters who will stop at nothing to secure their territory.
Instructions: Drag to move your character

Title: Soft Girls Winter Aesthetics
Description: Hop on a plane and spend your winter vacation traveling around the world together with your favorite princesses. Discover fun winter activities and practice your fashion advisor skills while helping them choose their outfits of the day in the Soft Girls Winter Aesthetics for girls! Have a blast!
Instructions: Use your mouse to browse through the category options and dress up the girls.

Title: Ramp Bike Jumping
Description: Perform the most unimaginable stunts on motorcycles, bicycles, even skis! There’s no backbone to be broken here! And we know a guy who knows a guy, whose sister-in-law bent some laws of physics for us. That’s right, you can get really crazy with our game. So buckle up, or not... It doesn’t matter. The only thing that matters is pure fun and madness!! YEE-HAW!
Instructions: Use the left mouse button to launch and use boost in flight!

Title: Portal TD - Tower Defense
Description: A portal opened, from which crowds of unknown creatures began to climb out! The player's task is to restrain the onslaught of the attackers with all his might, using towers defense.
Instructions: mouse or touchscreen

Title: Solitaire Match
Description: Let's develop the village by accumulating coins in Solitaire. When you match cards to make a total of 10, the cards will disappear, earning you coins. Continue removing cards until there are no more matching combinations, and clear the stage by achieving the coin quota. If the quota is not achieved and the slots become full, it's a failure. Earn more coins by matching combinations with a greater number of cards or by continuously matching cards in a short amount of time.
Instructions: Tap a card to add it to your hand.

Title: Excavator Simulator 3D
Description: Drive and operate realistic 3D construction vehicles in Excavator Simulator 3D. You can choose from different trucks, excavators, and Pincer Jaws to complete various missions and tasks. Whether you need to dig, clamp, lift, hammer, or forklift, you can switch the attachments easily and quickly. Learn how to control these powerful machines and enjoy the realistic physics and graphics. Complete the levels faster and earn more money to buy more vehicles and unlock new challenges. Have fun!
Instructions:
On PC
W - Gas
S - Brake or Backward
A - Turn left
D - Turn right
Left wheel - rotate mechanic arm
Right wheel - accelerate mechanic arm
On Mobile
Hold Arrows - steering
Hold pedals - drive forward or back
Swipe wheels - accelerate

Title: Design With Me SuperHero Tutu Outfits
Description: Welcome to Design With Me SuperHero Tutu Outfits. We all love superheroes very much! Likewise, our favorite princesses are inspired more by superhero tutu fashion. They planned to organize the fashion events under this theme. Join and help each princess to pick a suitable superhero tutu outfit. Play them and have fun!
Instructions: Left Mouse Button click

Title: Garden Tales Mahjong 2
Description: Welcome to the second instalment of the popular Mahjong game that combines Solitaire Mahjong gameplay with the beautiful theme of the legendary Garden Tales match 3 game. Garden Tales Mahjong 2 features incredible 250+ puzzle layouts, 'Quick Play' mode for instant action, 'Chapters Mode' to unlock new puzzles. The more puzzles you complete the more puzzles you unlock. Enjoy this captivating journey and start your Garden Tales Mahjong adventure today!
Instructions: Dive into Garden Tales Mahjong 2 where matching garden-themed tiles blooms fun. Did you get stuck? Use Shuffle, Torch, or Hint to advance through chapters with beautiful garden backdrops, unlocking more as you go. Quick Play offers endless puzzles for quick enjoyment. Clear boards, boost scores, and enjoy a strategic escape in this enchanting sequel. Start your Garden-Tales-themed adventure now!

Title: Fat Cat Life
Description: In this game you will have a bunch of cats to choose from, a huge selection of hats and a variety of tasks. From the simplest to the most difficult.
Instructions:
Complete tasks and earn coins. Spend coins to buy new cats and hats.

On phone: Joystick control
On PC: Control WASD

Title: Worm Out: Brain Teaser Games
Description: An exciting online puzzle game, where you can solve interesting logical puzzles to save the juicy fruit from pesky pests. Worms completely naked! Which of them will become a beautiful butterfly, and who will go to the dungeon, you decide.
Instructions:
** Your main task is to get all the worms out using all available means.
** The controls are very simple. Click on the smartphone screen or left mouse button on a PC to activate the mechanisms.

Title: Cannon Blast - The Last Stand
Description: You are in control of a cannon and the enemy army is marching towards you. You have to improve your skills, collect coins to buy upgrades, and never retreat because this is The Last Stand.
Instructions:
W / S: Cannon up / Cannon down
A / D: Move you sight left / right
Q / E: Zoom in, zoom out
P: Use parachute
SPACE: Maintain and leave to shoot
F: Maintain to open ball selection

Title: Sword Life
Description: The job of a blacksmith this one is not only how to forge the best sword! You have to get the most amazing materials, and then you have to sell the sword! But you can do it!
Instructions: - Use tap or mouse to forge new swords

Title: Rescue Rift
Description: Embark on a heart-pounding mission in "Rescue Rift," an intense and immersive action-adventure game that challenges your tactical skills and courage. As an elite operative of an undercover rescue team, you find yourself thrust into the depths of danger as you attempt to save hostages who have been kidnapped and confined within the eerie confines of an old, abandoned hospital.
Instructions:
- Arrow/ WASD to Move
- Left mouse button to shoot
- Right mouse button for scope
- Scroll to change Weapon
- E to Rescue

Title: Tile Connect Club
Description: Tile Connect Club is a brain-training game that tests your linking skills. You have to connect tiles with different pictures in pairs and clear them all within a limited time. You can enjoy various pictures on the tiles, such as animals, fruits, flowers, and more. You can also play faster and faster to become a tile master. Tile Connect Club is a fun and addictive game that challenges your mind and eyes. If you are looking for some tile-connecting action, then download Tile Connect Club now!
Instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

Title: Words Match
Description: This catchy combo of word search and spelling bee lets you create thousands of words with different lengths. Try to improve your score while hitting the targets presented in every unique level, and upgrade your word tiles to keep progressing! Relax and train your brain at the same time - can you pass all the levels in Words Match?
Instructions: Use your mouse or touchscreen to make words from the letters on the screen. Your objective is shown at the start of the level, and is always visible in the top left corner. You can upgrade your letter tiles from the homescreen.

Title: Ninja Climb
Description: Embark on a thrilling ascent in Ninja Climb, a captivating 2D game where your nimble ninja scales towering buildings. Click to seamlessly leap between structures, dodging obstacles along the way, and utilize rewarded video ads to revive when challenges arise, ensuring an adrenaline-packed ninja adventure.
Instructions: Climb to new heights in Ninja Climb, a 2D game where quick clicks propel your ninja between buildings, avoiding obstacles, and use rewarded video ads for strategic revivals.

Title: Pet Salon 2
Description: Take care of the cutest puppy and cat that you can bathe, help it when it is sick and choose an outfit  and dress it up! Pet Salon 2 is very helpful for the daycare of your pet and have too much fun with this game.
Instructions: Take care of the cutest puppy and cat that you can bathe, help it when it is sick and choose an outfit  and dress it up!

Title: Chicken Wars Merge Guns
Description: The lands of the chickens are under attack. They are trying to defend themselves with their guns. Help them! It is a tower defense game in which you merge chickens and create more powerful chickens to defend your lands. The enemy will come over you wave by wave. Make sure they don't break your defense.
Instructions:
Use "MOUSE" and "LEFT-CLICK" to interact with the buttons.
Don't forget to make updates during the battle.
You can also take some power-ups to strengthen your defense.

Title: Kobolm Rescue
Description:
Kobolm Rescue is a casual managment game about saving cute creatures from dangerous caves and building them a new home.

Manage your Kobolm Rescue Crew, search for sleepy Kobolms  in caves, collect materials, and build them a nice new home on the beach!
Instructions:
Click on one of your Kobolms to select them and on something you want your Kobolm to interact with to send them off.
Click on an empty space to build.
You can move the camera by clicking and dragging and you can zoom with the mouse wheel.

Title: Clean The Ocean
Description: Pick up waste, clean up oil spills and heal the oceans bit by bit! Venture out on your own boat, clear out parts of the sea and make sure you recycle everything properly. This game is the perfect way to teach kids about ecology and recycling, or just to pass the time in a mindful way. Level up the ship and leave a lasting legacy on planet Earth.
Instructions: Use the mouse or touchscreen to navigate the seas. Stop over in areas where you see trash to pick it up, and then travel back to your seaport. The wharf has a recycling point where you can sort out the litter you picked up during your voyage out on the water. Sort the items, starting from the top-left bin and ending at the bottom-right bin. Then use the collected money to purchase upgrades for your ship! You can for example increase the ship’s speed and carrying capacity.

Title: Granny Pills - Defend Cactuses
Description:
2075 year. After the invasion of aliens, there was almost no life and oxygen left on Earth. The only plant that survived are cacti. The aliens want to destroy or steal all the cactuses to stop the live on Earth.

The brave Granny who grows her cactuses on the road (so that they can receive rays of light) should protect them from aliens. She discovered that the aliens are afraid of human pills, and she has a huge amount of them, as well as a shotgun loaded in case of emergency.
Instructions: Click & Hold to aim. Release to throw the pill. Match the color of the pill with monster's color to destroy it. Protect your cacti and survive as long as possible!

Title: Tile Match Connect 3 Tiles
Description:
You have to tap and match all the tiles to clear the playing field before the timer expires. It can help you focus and hone your skills to think and react quickly. Go to the unearthly world and become a master of the match 3 game genre!

Enjoy this mahjong tile matching game and enjoy moments of peace during the day to calm your mind and recharge your brain. Sharpen your mind with a series of tile matching levels that gradually increase the difficulty of the puzzle. Relax and enjoy the beautiful scenery backgrounds and use your creativity to decorate your own zen room to relax!

Let matching tiles become your new hobby for a relaxed creative mind. Come back to it every day, as there are always new daily mahjong puzzles that allow you to take care of your own houseplant and become a mahjong master!
Instructions:
? Find three identical tiles and just click on them to stack them at the very bottom of the playing field. As soon as you find three identical cards, they will be removed from the stack, making room for your new combinations.
? If you cleared the entire playing field in the game "three in a row", you won.
If you failed to make a single combination in the stack, you lost. Therefore, do not allow more than seven tiles without combinations to be in your stack at the same time.
Control: LMB/Touch

Title: Cute Coloring Games
Description: Cute Coloring Games is a fun drawing coloring game. Filled with fun, colorful and creative drawing tools, coloring games help kids of all ages have fun creating art. Follow the prompts will draw and finish coloring it! Don't forget to share the success with your friends!
Instructions: Slide to draw

Title: Military Cubes 2048
Description: A game in the genre of 2048. Skillfully use the game physics to your advantage. The goal of the game is to connect the cubes to the maximum number 2048 and not to lose. There is a booster in the game, which will make it fun and easier to pass the game.
Instructions:
Objective of the game: Get the maximum number of points and become the leader 
Roll cubes in the genre of 2048.
I.e. if you throw a cube with a face value of 2 on a cube with a face value of 2, you will get a cube of 4 out of the 2. That is, the face value is doubled. With cubes with different denominations nothing happens, so they start to accumulate and overflow the playing area, which complicates the game and can lead to a loss.

Title: Merge Master Skibidi Bop
Description: Discover the fantasy world of Skibidi monsters in the Merge Master: Skibidi Bop! Merge your terrible monsters, make them evolve, and have the most powerful army. You need to use your tactics and your brain to combine monsters and fight the Skibidi toilet! You need to evolve your monsters quickly and have a strong army! If you want to win this battle, you need to evolve your monster quickly to get a huge army! Come on!
Instructions: Click monster buttons to buy monsters, drag the same monsters to merge them, and get a higher-level monster

Title: Sniper vs Sniper
Description: Sniper vs. Sniper is a game where players compete in sniper shooting skills. Each player takes on the role of a sniper, participating in intense battles with an opponent. Exciting long-distance sniper duels where key skills include accuracy, strategy, and quick reaction.
Instructions:
WASD - Walk
Space - Jump
Left mouse button - Shoot
Right mouse button - Aim

Title: Tanks. Race for survival
Description: In this exciting tank game, you compete with other players to be the first to reach the finish line, destroying enemy towers along your way. Control powerful tanks, use tactical thinking and strategic maneuvers to overcome obstacles and defeat opponents. Carefully plan your route, avoiding enemy attacks and traps on the path to victory. The thrilling survival race begins here!
Instructions:
Mouse: left button
Touchpad

Title: Draw The Weapon
Description: Draw The Weapon is a free online action and drawing game for boys played on PuzzleGame. The game is divided into two parts. First, you need to draw your weapons with limited ink. Next, enter the battlefield, and then shoot the enemy down the cliff with weapons to win the battle. In addition to a variety of weapons, we also provide wonderful skins for you, Mobile, Tablet, and Desktop are playable!
Instructions: Mouse or tap to play.

Title: Geometry Vertical
Description: In Poligon Dash - Geometry, you find yourself entangled in an adrenaline-fueled run against time and various geometric obstacles. This game offers a dynamic mix of speed, calculations, and precision. With each level being a new challenge filled with exciting twists and turns, your journey to the finish line will keep you on your toes
Instructions:
mobile
mode cube = swipe right or left to move lane
mode rocket = hold and release to change angle
mode cars = hold left or right to turn and release to move straight
windows
mode cube = Click mouse left or right to change lane
mode rocket = hold and release mouse left to change angle
mode cars = hold mouse left or right to turn and release to move straight

Title: Boxing Gang Stars
Description: The stars are in the boxing ring and it is time to fight! These funny boxing characters are trying to destroy each other either in 1 player or in 2 player mode. Start this boxing competition and become the king of the boxing rings! Super fun physics with fun characters is waiting for you! Let the box fights begin!
Instructions:
Player 1:
Move: "W, A, S, D" or "ARROW KEYS"(1P Mode only)
Punch: "F, G, T"
Block: "E"

Player 2:
Move: "ARROW KEYS"
Punch: "K, L, O"
Block: "I"
